episode.title: Drastically Shakier
episode.author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
episode.description: Special guest Ben Thompson returns to the show. Topics include Apple's horrible no good very bad earnings warning, the Chinese market, Apple's push toward services for revenue growth, antitrust issues regarding the App Store, and more.
episode.showNotes:
Special guest Ben Thompson returns to the show. Topics include Apple's horrible no good very bad earnings warning, the Chinese market, Apple's push toward services for revenue growth, antitrust issues regarding the App Store, and more.

  • “Apple’s Errors” — Ben’s take on Apple’s earnings warning.
  • “Apple’s Terrible No Good Very Bad Earnings Warning” — my take.
